LandingPage.title: Assemble Your Elite Team
LandingPage.subtitle: The definitive LFG platform for Valorant. Stop solo queuing and start dominating with the perfect team.
LandingPage.features_subtitle: All the tools you need to enjoy the game at the highest level.
LandingPage.find_players_desc: Browse detailed player profiles, filter by role and rank, and find the perfect fit for your roster.
LandingPage.scrims_desc: Post and find practice matches to take your team to the next level.
LandingPage.tournaments_desc: Sign up for community-run tournaments and compete for glory and prizes.
LandingPage.footer_rights: All rights reserved. Built for the future of esports.

ForgotPasswordPage.title: Reset Password

ForgotPasswordPage.success_description: If an account with {email} exists, a password reset link has been sent.

AboutPage.title: About Rankeon
AboutPage.subtitle: Connecting players, forging champions.
AboutPage.community_desc: We are a hub for passionate gamers looking to take their play to the next level. We believe in the power of teamwork and healthy competition.
AboutPage.mission_desc: Our mission is simple: to provide the best platform for players to find teammates, compete in scrims and tournaments, and grow as competitors.
AboutPage.values_desc: Integrity, sportsmanship, and a relentless dedication to improvement are at the core of everything we do at Rankeon.
AboutPage.join_us_desc: Whether you're looking for your first team or you're a seasoned veteran, Rankeon is your proving ground. Sign up today and unleash your potential.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.introduction_text: Welcome to Rankeon. Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our web application.
PrivacyPage.data_collected_list: Account Information: When you register, we collect your email address and username.|Riot Games Data: With your consent, we access data from your Riot Games account, including your Riot ID, summoner name, match history, game stats, and rank. **We do not store your Riot Games password.**|Usage Data: We collect information on how you interact with our application, such as pages visited and actions taken.|Cookies and Tracking: We use cookies to maintain your session and understand site usage. We may use analytics services like Google Analytics to help us improve.
PrivacyPage.how_data_is_used_list: To provide and improve our services: Display your profile, match history, and statistics.|To personalize your experience: Connect you with other players and teams.|To communicate with you: Send you notifications about the application.|For analytics: Understand how our service is used so we can improve it.
PrivacyPage.data_sharing_text: We do not sell your personal data. We may share your information as follows: With other users: Your game profile (summoner name, rank, stats) is visible to other Rankeon users. With service providers: We use third-party services (like Firebase for hosting and database) that process data on our behalf. With legal requirements: If required by law.
PrivacyPage.data_security_text: We take reasonable measures to protect your information, but no security system is impenetrable. We cannot guarantee the absolute security of your data.
PrivacyPage.your_rights_text: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can update your profile information directly in the application. For other requests, please contact us.
PrivacyPage.cookies_text_intro: Rankeon uses cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience on the platform. A cookie is a small data file stored on your device. Below are the types of cookies we use:
PrivacyPage.cookies_list: Essential Cookies: Fundamental for the platform's operation. They are used to keep your session logged in, manage security, and remember your cookie consent. They cannot be disabled.|Analytics Cookies: We use tools like Google Analytics to collect anonymous data on how users interact with Rankeon. This helps us identify issues, understand usage patterns, and improve the application. You can opt-out via your browser settings.|Preference Cookies: Used to remember your choices, such as language or theme (light/dark), so you don't have to set them each time you visit.|Managing Cookies: Most browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. However, restricting cookies may impact the functionality of our website.
PrivacyPage.contact_text: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: support@rankeon.app

TermsPage.title: Terms of Service
TermsPage.agreement_text: By using the Rankeon application ('Service'), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part of the terms, then you may not access the Service.
TermsPage.service_desc_text: Rankeon is a platform to help gamers find teams and compete. We use the Riot Games API to provide game-related data but are not affiliated with or endorsed by Riot Games.
TermsPage.user_responsibilities_list: You must be at least 13 years old to use the Service.|You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account.|You must not use the Service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose.|You agree to comply with Riot Games' Terms of Service at all times.
TermsPage.disclaimer_text: The Service is provided 'as is'. We make no warranty that the service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free. Data provided via the Riot Games API is for informational purposes only.
TermsPage.limitation_liability_text: In no event shall Rankeon be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages arising out of your use of the Service.
TermsPage.changes_terms_text: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new terms on this page.
TermsPage.contact_text: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at: support@rankeon.app

Pricing.title: Choose Your Path to Glory
Pricing.subtitle: Flexible plans designed for serious players and team leaders.
Pricing.player_desc: For every player looking to join a team and compete. Find your squad and start playing.
Pricing.player_features: Create your player profile|Search the market for teams|Receive invites from team leaders|Chat with friends|Honor your teammates
Pricing.founder_desc: For leaders ready to build a legacy. All the tools to create and manage an elite team.
Pricing.founder_features: Create & customize your team|Recruit players from the market|Manage members and roles|Post and accept scrims|Register for tournaments|Access advanced management panel
Pricing.coach_desc: For the strategists who guide teams to victory. Analyze, manage, and lead.
Pricing.coach_features: Join a team as a Coach|Manage team members and roles|Access team analytics (soon)|Assign IGL roles|Participate in scrim planning

RegisterPage.accept_error: You must accept the Terms and Privacy Policy to continue.

CookieBanner.message: We use cookies to enhance your experience. To comply with privacy regulations, we need your consent to set these cookies.

CookieCustomize.title: Customize Cookie Preferences
CookieCustomize.description: Manage your cookie settings. You can enable or disable different types of cookies below. Necessary cookies cannot be disabled.
CookieCustomize.necessary_desc: These cookies are essential for the website to function and cannot be disabled. They are used for security, session management, and other core features.
CookieCustomize.analytics_desc: These cookies help us understand how you use our site by collecting anonymous data (e.g., using Firebase Analytics). This allows us to improve the user experience.

GamesPage.title: Supported Games
GamesPage.subtitle: Explore the games featured on Rankeon.
GamesPage.valorant_desc: A 5v5 character-based tactical shooter where precise gunplay meets unique agent abilities. Teamwork, strategy, and clutch plays are key to victory.
GamesPage.league_of_legends_desc: League of Legends is a 5v5 MOBA where two teams compete to destroy the enemy nexus. Each player controls a champion with unique abilities, and the game combines strategy, reflexes, and teamwork.

RoomsPage.subtitle: Find a group or create your own to play now.

ProposeTournamentDialog.title: Propose a New Tournament
ProposeTournamentDialog.description: Fill out the details for your tournament idea. Our staff will review it for approval.
ProposeTournamentDialog.name: Tournament Name
ProposeTournamentDialog.desc_rules_placeholder: Describe your tournament, including rules, prize pools, stream links, etc.

TournamentGuideDialog.title: Tournament Format Guide
TournamentGuideDialog.description: Learn about the different tournament formats available.
TournamentGuideDialog.single_elim_desc: The fastest way to a champion. In this high-stakes format, a single loss means your team is out of the tournament. It's a pure knockout system, perfect for large events where time is of the essence.
TournamentGuideDialog.double_elim_desc: A format that rewards resilience. Every team gets a second chance. After your first loss, you drop to the 'Lower Bracket' to fight your way back. Lose again, and you're eliminated. The winners of the Upper and Lower Brackets face off in the Grand Final.
TournamentGuideDialog.round_robin_desc: The most comprehensive test of skill. Every team plays against every other team in their group at least once. Standings are determined by total wins, making it a true measure of consistency. Ideal for smaller groups to find a clear top team.
TournamentGuideDialog.swiss_system_desc: A balanced, non-eliminating format perfect for large fields of competitors. In each round, you're paired against an opponent with the same or a very similar win-loss record. This ensures competitive matches throughout the event without needing to play everyone.

MessagesPage.no_conversations: You have no conversations. Add friends from the market to start chatting.
MessagesPage.select_chat_subtitle: Choose a conversation from the list to start chatting.
MessagesPage.block_confirm_desc: This action is irreversible. You will not be able to send or receive messages from this user and they will be removed from your friends list.
MessagesPage.delete_history_desc: This will permanently delete all messages in this conversation for both participants. This action cannot be undone.
MessagesPage.remove_friend_desc: This will remove this user from your friends list and the chat history will be permanently deleted. To chat again, you will need to send a new friend request.
MessagesPage.user_blocked_desc: {name} has been blocked. You will not be able to message them.
MessagesPage.friend_removed_desc: You are no longer friends with {name}.
MessagesPage.history_deleted_desc: The chat history has been cleared for both of you.

SupportDialog.title: Contact Support
SupportDialog.description: Have an issue or a question? Let us know.
SupportDialog.subject: Subject

SupportTicketsList.no_tickets_desc: There are no open support tickets.

SupportPage.title: Help Center
SupportPage.subtitle: Need a hand? You've come to the right place.
SupportPage.ai_desc: Get instant answers to your questions about the platform.
SupportPage.ai_note: Widget is in the bottom-right corner.
SupportPage.faq_desc: Find answers to the most common questions.
SupportPage.refund_desc: Review our policies and how to request a refund.
SupportPage.contact_title: Can't find what you're looking for?
SupportPage.contact_desc: Our support team is here to help you out.
SupportPage.faq_q1: How do I create a team?
SupportPage.faq_a1: To create a team, you need the 'Founder' role. You can get this role from our pricing plans. Once you have the role, go to the 'My Team' page and follow the steps to create your team.
SupportPage.faq_q2: How can I propose a tournament?
SupportPage.faq_a2: Proposing tournaments is available to verified streamers, moderators, and admins. If you meet the criteria, you will find a 'Propose Tournament' button on the tournaments page.
SupportPage.faq_a3: Teams can post open scrims (practice matches) for other teams to challenge. Once a challenge is accepted, the match is confirmed. After the match, either team can report the result to update the stats.

RefundPage.title: Refund Policy
RefundPage.subtitle: Information on how to request a refund for your subscriptions.
RefundPage.eligibility_desc: We offer refunds for Founder and Coach subscriptions within 7 days of purchase, provided the core features (like creating a team or accepting a coach invite) have not been used.
RefundPage.process_step1: Open a support ticket using the button below.
RefundPage.process_step2: Select 'Account Issue' or 'General Question' as the subject.
RefundPage.process_step3: In your message, please include your purchase date and the reason for your refund request. Our team will review your request and get back to you.
